headline: Discovery Silver Stock: A 300% Price Increase Is A Gift, So Take It

headline: Newmont: The World's Largest Gold Miner, But Is It Losing Its Shine
summary: Newmont's (NEM) undervalued gold and copper portfolio, coupled with strong cash flow and improving operations, may present a compelling opportunity. See more.
